name: LetsHire
tag_list: permanent-staffing, permanent-staffing-mumbai, permanent-staffing-services, permanent-staffing-services-mumbai, permanent-staffing-pune, permanent-staffing-bangalore, permanent-staffing-hydrabad, permanent-staffing-chennai, permanent-staffing-delhi, perma
overview:
LetsHire is leading Recruitment firm with HQ at Mumbai & branches in Pune, Bangalore, Hyderabad & Delhi. LetsHire is a division of 2Soft Solutions which undertake whole IT & NON IT Recruitment Services.

LetsHire started in 2009 with vision to provide world class HR Services & enhanced his expertise in HR Consulting, Permanent Staffing, Temp/Contract Staffing, Contract to Hire, RPO, 360 degree feedback for IT & NON IT clients on PAN India as well as with some of international clients.

WHY CHOOSE US?  Top class management team.  Quick turnaround for your demands.  Dedicated & highly-qualified Account Manager & Recruiters.  Proven records on IT & NON IT recruitments.  Unique database from our own portal (http://www.LetsHire.co.in)  Headhunting to close niche positions.

List Of Services - HR Consulting - Permanent Staffing - Temp/Contract Staffing - Contract to Hire - Recruitment Process Outsourcing(RPO) - 360 Degree Feedback - Payroll Services - Hire Dedicated Team
